website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, compact machine that's ideal for kitchens with limited counter space.
pros: Nice-looking machine in black and silver
Super compact in size, but big on taste
Produces authentic-tasting espresso from the 15-bar pump-drive
Comes with a hot-water swivel jet arm for producing frothy milk
cons: Some users find this machine too noisy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home lattes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this machine for a few months now. It is so user friendly and EASY if you read the instruction manual. I was a barista for 5 years and always used automatic machines. This manual makes way better quality espresso in my opinion. Definitely buy somethIng to tamp the espresso down. I also bought a smaller pitcher to stream milk because this steam wand sits low. I use any shot glasses I have around the house and I’ve never had trouble with them fitting. I researched a lot of espresso machines before I settled on this one and I’m happy with my final decision. Definitely the best quality for a midrange espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: I finally decided to give the DeLonghi EC155M a chance and I now know I made the best choice! It is perfect on my counter
customer_reviews.text: As a beginning espresso maker I was very nervous about buying a coffee maker. I finally decided to give the DeLonghi EC155M a chance and I now know I made the best choice! It is perfect on my counter, doesn't take up a lot of room. But the big test was making coffee. It passed all tests and I now make coffee with ease. So easy to work and also easy clean up. I am so happy with my purchase! For any beginner this machine is the best and believe me, I did so much homework before purchasing one. Have fun with it and enjoy a great cup of espresso.
customer_reviews.author: dennis jaggers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the counter space
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee is an essential in our home. Unfortunately, this machine is neither reliable nor easy to use. Its short, squatty design may make it easy to store on the counter under a cabinet, but it's impossible to use normal sized cups and/or a regular sized steamed milk pitcher. Added to that, half the time the espresso is weaker than a cup of instant coffee. I'm back to using my stove-top espresso maker and milk frother. This is not a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: David Featheringill

customer_reviews.title: Steam Wand Does Not Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Espresso is good. Machine shakes when espresso is coming out so I have to hold the cup to make sure the liquid goes into the cup. The steam wand DOES NOT heat up the milk enough. The milk will only steam up to maybe a lukewarm temperature. I end up having to make a latte and then heat up the latte in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: OH_AZ2009

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Avoid purchasing this model
customer_reviews.text: It never primed even after letting it run for 5 minutes. It rattles more than an earthquake and you have to hold the cup(s) in place or they will slide right off. Garbage. Avoid purchasing this model!
customer_reviews.author: KaiKai Louise

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design,
customer_reviews.text: Overwhelmingly dissappointed! After making about only 5 wonderful coffees I was unable to attach the coffee filter holder in any securie manner causing steaming coffee and grounds to flow everywhere. There is a little rail in the locking mechanism on the machine which constantly comes loose. I have received no help from the company.even though the product is under warranty. The machine has been useless to me. Today I tried again and got 1 cycle of coffee. After placing the freshly refilled basket back, I could not make a firm connection and had coffee and grounds everywhere. I bought this machine as a Christmas gift for my husband and myself. I am now looking for a new expresso maker oberonreed@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Claire H. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse fail.
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked fine until I actually tried to use the machine. The portafilter that came with this machine was actually a portafilter for another machine therefore rendering this product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: They usually last around a year, this one cost a lot more and arrived broken.  No more DeLonghi pots.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the older model of this machine for years. They last about a year. I paid $99, $20 more to get the EC155M delivered in 2 day on prime as my last pot stopped working after less than a year. It arrived! I assembled it as always and the pump is broken (it makes a weird noise and makes no coffee. 4th of July, so no one is home at DeLonghi. Faithful cusotmer no more. I need caffeine!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. After doing so many reviews this is the one I picked, I enjoy the simplicity of the machine and if you pack your coffee correctly it produces a great espresso shot. The height of the machine is not tall enough to anything but the DeLonghi espresso glasses underneath it. So make sure you get those, but super happy with this machine. Great buy for such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Carr

customer_reviews.title: I'm never buying this again!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this espresso machine!! I've had it since December and it's still doing great! It makes the richest and creamiest cappuccinos that I've ever had😁 Update: Today I tried to froth milk from the machines frother and when I turned the knob, the frother wouldn't start up!! Being that Delonghi is a name brand, I expected the frother to last longer than today! I've only had this piece of crap since December! But it does still brew coffee.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeFamily

customer_reviews.title: Customer service and warranty isworthless
customer_reviews.text: One week after the return time had expired the machine stopped working. After posting the above lines I have been trying to contact delonghi customer service No one answers the phone. They must figure That your time has no value or that you will quit calling after awhile. I stopped calling the Delonghi customer service number after spending more that 10hours on hold over a 5 day period. They truly are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for the money. I have spent up to $1500 on other machines. I bought this because I was tired of high cost and difficult maintenance. Now I get a great espresso or latte at a reasonable cost with a simple affordable machine. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this coffee machine compared with my old Saeco (of similar price). My espresso cups almost do not fit in, despite being for espresso, and the coffee cream is not of the quality/density I used to have with my old machine, despite using same coffee beans and having tried with different grinds. The taste seems also different, not sure if because of the temperature (coffee is quite hot and you cannot drink it straight away). The quality of the materials and design for what you pay is quite good, but I was expecting to have better espressos. I do not recommend buying it and personally I regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this machine, I’ve been doing a ton of research on espresso and heard some good reviews & was in my price range. Unfortunately, it had some major flaws. It shook pretty intensly so when I would have to hold my cups while the espresso would pour or else it would shake the cup out from under the spout. Also, the milk foamer worked once then began to burn the milk without foaming it. I cleaned it well tried again and still couldn’t get it to foam the milk. Just really wish this was what I was looking for but in my mind it had way to many flaws for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Best

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it lasted only one year
customer_reviews.text: We liked this coffee maker a lot (while it lasted). We used it several times a day, and liked the coffee it made. We did clean it once twice with vinegar, but it was easy to use and reliable - until it wasn't. Today it's taking 5 times longer to heat up, and then only stays at operating temperature for 10 to 20 seconds before the green light goes off again. I suspect that the heating element is dying. The DeLonghi we had before this one lasted us for 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Alger

customer_reviews.title: Ideal coffee maker for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to coffee makers people are really harsh with the reviews. I think it's really important to set the expectations clear. If you are looking for your first espresso machine to learn and brew your morning coffee this is the perfect product for you!! Many of the negative reviews I read were people expecting advanced features that would be impossible in this price range. This model it's a great price/value relation!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Z

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only one month!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, had only for one month, used maybe 20 times, and this morning it burned up, smoke poured out of it, complete piece of junk. For the short time it did work, the pours were very inconsistent, and the espresso was weak and watery, no matter what type of bean used. Don't buy this fire hazard, you'll be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Break

customer_reviews.title: Get the extra warranty through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best espresso machine out there but they break in a year or two and the manufacturer's warranty is useless. They won't even return e-mails or requests for information. We are on our third machine in five years but all the other good espresso machine are super expensive and this is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works well for espresso
customer_reviews.text: I make two cups at a time, great for double shot of espresso. The tamp works, and the tray catches any grounds. Makes for easy cleaning. I have used the frothe wand a couple times, a bit cumbersome. Not sure I would recommend for Cappuccino.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for espresso lover
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who just start or just want a new machine that serves you right in the morning without the bustle and hustle of setting things up. This machine is one of the best. Easy clean and easy assemble, I always clean the parts up right away. A slight complain is that the nozzle for foam is not sustainable, one should be careful and clean them whenever done using it. Other than that, this machine has brought me many happiness by a fresh smell and feels of achievement
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: It took a few easy test runs to produce a very enjoyable cup of espresso.
customer_reviews.text: This little espresso machine seems to work in my home as good as the much bigger automatic commercial dual spout machine did in my coffee shop. Of course it is entirely manually operated but considering its size and ease of use it does an outstanding job.
customer_reviews.author: Suncityan

customer_reviews.title: A Nice little beginner machine
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works great. I am a beginner so I'm new at espresso's. But it will be cheaper than buying them. Also a 20 oz frothing pitcher is too big for the length of the spout. A 12 oz would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sarajane

customer_reviews.title: "Used and like new" YEAH RIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The machine was recieved dirty, broken and parts missing. There was espresso in the filter from the previous owner and the milk frother was still crusty and obviously hadn't been cleaned. I know I bought it used, but you would think there would be more integrity put into something that's being advertised as "like new." Not to mention, it doesn't even work. As soon as the espresso shots begin to pull, water starts leaking from the entire machine. Disappointed but whatever, I just wish things were priced correctly for what they are worth.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Lawson Egan

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Solid espresso machine for the price. Took me a little while to figure out what the optimal grind is (too coarse and it renders weaker, too fine and it produces no froth), but now produces very good espresso for my morning Americano. The only complaint is that gap for the cup is seized very small. Had to remove the catch plate to fit in a normal sized coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great so far after about 3 weeks. Had the ec155 for about 4-5 years before it stopped effectively making espresso shots. I like the updates on the “m” which include metal/rubber filter holder (in place of plastic), what seems to be more precise steam wand control, and the fact that the remainder (that I can see) was left alone.
customer_reviews.author: tpmmem

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a espresso newbie
customer_reviews.text: My first espresso machine. I drink mostly cappuccinos and this machine works great for that. It takes a little experimenting to get your espresso and steamed milk to come out to your preferences, but thats true of any espresso machine. If drank straight espresso I might be able to justify spending a few hundred more for a better machine to refine the espresso, but....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sometimes it seems the pressure is off, that the espresso isn't as dark as it should be, but I'm not overly picky. There's likely an art to the packing and tamping of the grind and it has to be tight but not too packed for a proper rich flow. I haven't quite mastered that yet but I'm pleased with the machine for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Good Cafe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd DeLonghi and just like the 1st model I purchased years ago this machine is making excellent espresso for me...The result of cafe this little machine is producing is like that of 800-1000$ machines...Stop thinking about it and buy it now if you're in the market for a espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Defective steamer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this machine at the first month then I noticed it started leaking water out of the steamer whenever I would get the espresso brewed. I didnt make a big deal out of it, just used a cup to cold the leak whenever I used the machine. Now in the past week and a half, water really squirts out when I get the espresso brewed and use the steamer...its making my milk really watery. So disappointed and I really wanted to love it. Can't return now since I threw out the box couple weeks ago. I dont know if I got a defective machine or the brand just made the machine that way.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ott

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I received worked well for a couple of months...then it suddenly failed, just stopped working all together. I contacted Delonghi, who responded professionally enough, and replaced the unit. Took them more than 2 weeks to send another unit, but at least they sent a replacement. Now, just a couple of weeks after receiving the replacement unit, the espresso machine has failed again... I can only surmise that this model is not very well made...definitely have concerns about longevity. Proceed cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrated so much a cup fell off
customer_reviews.text: This machine vibrated so much that a cup fell off and made a big mess! It is also loud for a little espresso machine. I did follow the instructions and expected it to vibrate at first, but after a week of use, it hadn't lessened as described in the manual. I returned it and got a better (and more expensive) model.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear J

customer_reviews.title: Consistently produces great quality coffee, awesome value
customer_reviews.text: great machine. works extremely well for me. it is a little loud, but I am not very sensitive to that. also, it is a stiff fit for the filter holder handle, but I did not have any problems with it, unlike the other users. What I didn't like was how low it was — you can only use small cups. Again, this does not affect the consistently great quality of the espresso it produces, but from the usability perspective I wish it accommodated bigger cups.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveller

customer_reviews.title: *Saeco Panarello(Latte Art) wand fits perfectly* Best Entry Level Machine for the Price!!!*
customer_reviews.text: After more than a year of researching for the right machine I went with this one a year ago. Best reviews for an entry level machine for espresso shots. (If you are really into espresso you will definitely outgrow this machine). The only down side is the milk frother. I would suggest to buy a handheld electric milk frother. Also, a 51mm tamper and and a 12oz frothing pitcher (if you are to use the machine's frothing wand). *Descaling every 3 months and Keeping it Clean after every use = long lasting Espresso Machine.*
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS JUNK! Second unit I have received. First one had a broken base. Returned. Second one arrived today. Placed a full water tank in the machine and it immediately drained out all over the counter. Checked to see if I had done something wrong. No. Refilled the tank and placed it in the machine. Water drained out again. Two bad units out of two? No quality control. I'm done with this manufacturer. Made in China JUNK! Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Maas

customer_reviews.title: Best impulse buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Xmas gift to myself and I love it. Had it for a couple months now and use it several times a week. Its super easy and straight forward to use. All my friends that have come over since are always impressed by it too. Would recommend to anyone who wants an affordable espresso machine to add to their counter.
customer_reviews.author: Christian M.

customer_reviews.title: Updated the original
customer_reviews.text: Had to rebuy after some plastic pieces broke out of the filter holder that holds when twisting the filter in. They updated some parts so it’s a lot nicer design.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the experience of intense flavorful coffee with a frother that actually works! Very happy to have found this product. Keeps the memories of coffee in Spain alive!
customer_reviews.author: formerhistoryprof

customer_reviews.title: Not going to Buy anymore
customer_reviews.text: This is our third espresso maker, same brand. Constantly have problems with this and not buying these anymore. Seller would not help either,
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Espresso Under Pressure Pump not like STEAM!
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a water tank, but you have to pay attention during operation to shut it down! Shots are not measured. Nice to be able to repeat once the messy filter is cleaned. BUT. The coffee shot is not HOT, and not free of grounds. Don't like pressure machines.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased one of those K-pods coffee makers and I returned it, the coffee was horrific... So, I talked to a friend who knows about coffee and he recommended an expresso machine, and after some research I made the DeLonghi good for the money. I've had it for more than 2 months and it's great, I def. recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: This product does get the job done but you must have patience if you want get multiple shots. I normally have 4 shots of espresso in the morning but its difficult to empty the filter. It also messy. I suggest buying a tamp too. It takes multiple attempts to get the puck right with the tamp already provided. You definitely need to buy espresso shot glasses. Nothing will fit under, and you will have about three inches of frothing space. For the price it's fine but like I said it takes a bit of patience.
customer_reviews.author: Labrada

customer_reviews.title: So far it's a good cup of espresso
customer_reviews.text: So far it works well and makes a good espresso just make sure to press the coffee down. Like the water tank feature and speed of brewing. So far the only negative is the space for the cup, its to low. I had to take the grate off to put small cup even.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as a normal expresso maker. So it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Allam

customer_reviews.title: Pay a touch more for a premium product
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy a new Cappuccino 1x/year- they always break. I have purchased Krups and the cheap Mr Coffee machines just because I wouldn't spend over $80. This machine I bought slightly used- complete upgrade in every manner and wont go back.
customer_reviews.author: Steven McQuerry

customer_reviews.title: Good product at good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entry level espresso maker. Regular size as small as many other household coffee maker but function as perfect as we need. I especially wanted to recommend FiFe Store. They did very good service after product sold. They do deserve five stars review.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Hsin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Unit is too light to be functional
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the coffee was fine. The reason I had to return this item was bc it is so light. You can’t crank the wand over. The unit will just move with it as you try and turn the wand into place. It would need to be anchored. I had to hold the unit with one hand and turn the wand into place with the other and it was very frustrating. Not a pleasant experience. I don’t know how any one can get past this!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Too short for a cup
customer_reviews.text: Beware: you can not use anything other than a very very short cup with this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E.

customer_reviews.title: and it was great, i followed all the steps and everything went ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today so i can only give a review on the first one i made, and it was great, i followed all the steps and everything went according to plan..... I'll leave another review in a year or so i guess
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice froth!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I love it! It is the ONLY espresso machine I have been using for the past 6 years. Between my husband and myself, we are using this machine about 5-6 times daily. It lasts for about 2 years! Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA LEMONIS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginner espresso unit. Got it as a gift for my brother and sister in laws. They seem to love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great Expresso coffee! Great milk frother. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The quality feels great, the Expresso y really good. I usually use Cuban o puerto Rican expreso coffee. Love it. It feels really premium
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Crema and the froth is thick and rich for ...
customer_reviews.text: Minor improvements made a major change. Great Crema and the froth is thick and rich for cappuccinos. The EC155 "M" is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: R. W

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey for the quality of espresso that it makes. Overheats from time to time. Has a really good milk frother though.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this machine. It is loud and does vibrate but this it makes me have expert crafted latte's just like I would spend $5 on.
customer_reviews.author: JGundy

customer_reviews.title: Great first espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I haven’t had any problems with it. It’s a little louder than I was expecting or than more expensive options I’ve seen other people use. One thing to note if you are buying espresso cups as well, there is a max of 2.5” to fit the cup in. I bought ones that are a bit larger, so it’s a squeeze to get them in and out without spilling any espresso. Would definitely get again though.
customer_reviews.author: robbm

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line basic machine
customer_reviews.text: The espresso is delicious, the machine is durable and easy to use. I've had four of these over my crazed coffee drinking history. Best basic machine on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very picky but she lives this thing. Makes a great cup of espresso. Buy it, NOW

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife as a Christmas gift! She loved it! We both use the product daily. It is quick to use and makes delicious morning cappuccinos!
customer_reviews.author: Auni and Trey

customer_reviews.title: A great espresso machine for under a hundred bucks
customer_reviews.text: My second DeLonghi (I wore out the last one over five years) this is a great espresso machine. It puts a nice crema on the coffee, makes rich espresso, and is quiet to operate. What more do you want? Maybe one of my wife's biscotti.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Such a great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best purchases I've ever made. I love my espresso and this little machine does a fantastic job, especially at the price point. It doesn't make super dry foam but I like it wet anyway so it's been perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: C.P. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want. Period.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried 4 different machines. This, hands down, is the best value and cup available.

customer_reviews.title: Actions over the last 20 years and this is absolutely the best one ever puts a nice foam on a cop of your cup

customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. I think the espresso turns out great, it even has the crema. Lattes are super easy to make, I honestly never get coffee outside the house anymore because I am so pleased with what I’m able to make at home.
customer_reviews.author: Pfrisbey

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has a water tank that allows me ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The 15-bar pressure does make a difference, the espresso itself comes out with foam. I love that it has a water tank that allows me to prepare several cups without having to let the machine cool down.

customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the steamer doesn't maintain heat very well and if you stop streaming then start again, even seconds later, it will be water for a bit. This just waters down the coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this machine daily for a couple of years and it still works great.

customer_reviews.text: The first espresso maker lasted for over two years. The most recent purchase lasted over 2 months. Very disappointing Hot pressurized water and coffee grounds splattered everywhere

customer_reviews.title: This review.
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost everyday now for about 4 months. Great cup of espresso with plenty of creamy foam on top. Heats up fast and fairly easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: The steamer constantly drips/pours water while the espresso is dripping. Otherwise I Iove this product. Will check warranty.

customer_reviews.title: No Room for a Cup!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this machine. But it just was not user friendly. The filter holder was almost impossible to insert without almost having to turn the machine upside down. And even after getting the holder in place, it took way too much strength to turn it. Also, the space between the filter and the cup holder was only 2 1/2 in. and there was no way I could get a cup of any size (except for a demitasse cup) under the filter. I sent it back and ordered a different machine.

product_meta.title: DeLonghi EC155M Manual Espresso Machine, Cappuccino Maker
product_meta.description: Style:SimpleThe De’Longhi EC155M Pump Espresso Machine brings the coffeehouse to your home. This compact machine is so simple to use, the most difficult decision you’ll face is whether to brew a single or double shot of espresso, or a delicious cappuccino. Entertaining guests is seamless with the Rapid Cappuccino System; it maintains the optimal temperature so you can brew cup after delicious cup without any wait time. The EC155M has two separate thermostats to control water and steam pressure separately so you can make espresso or cappuccino at the perfect temperature every time. Its 3-in-1 filter is designed for one or two espressos and easy-serve espresso pods, giving you a multitude of brewing options. It has a dishwasher safe drip tray and a removable 35 oz. water tank. With its durable, high-quality stainless steel boiler and 15-bar professional pump pressure, you’ll enjoy delicious, authentic espresso and cappuccino for years to come. The input power is 1100 watts and the pump pressure is 15 bar
feature_bullets: Metal: top, control panel and drip tray. Stainless steel boiler. Transparent water reservoir (capacity: 1 l.)
Self-priming system means machine is always ready for use. 2 separate thermostats to control water and steam temperatures
“Cappuccino System”: it mixes steam, air and milk, producing a rich, creamy froth for great cappuccino
Single selector knob for on/off, espresso and cappuccino with indicator lights. Adjustable steam emission
Special filter holder for ground coffee and “Easy Serving Espresso” pods with crema device( 2 different filters with crema device)
Removable drip-tray. Anti drip system. Incorporated coffee tamper
